name: PIX ITEM - KNIGHT HELMET
description:
Welcome to V1 PIX! 

Burn me before burning an egg, an existing PIX or before sending an existing PIX to sacrifice.tez, and get me equipped on the PIX!

I can't be equipped on a PIX with an already equipped item of the same category. If this happens, I'll stay there waiting for the next egg or PIX to equip me.

My category is: ITEM_HELMET!

Always remember to burn your items and send your tokens to sacrifice.tez first!

---

When equipped, the chances to receive a higher tier helmet and item quality depend on:

- Luck
- Egg rarity
- Sacrificed $EVIL & $DARK.

On this item, there are 2 special EVIL and 2 special DARK colors, with 4 other "normal" quality colors.

Helmet tier and item quality change score on equipped PIX.when hatching with equipped items.

---

Check out every pix with their score, the collection, and other hatch informations and rules on our website: >>>> https://the_pix.xyz/ <<<<

You can also join our PIX community, 
on Discord: https://discord.gg/aE4EvY8TfK 
and Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/VeAH-g9TcwMxMzdk

Follow @ThePIX_tez to get more informations about traits rarity, new items and other crazy stuff!
